-1.title: Brimstone at Victoria Comic Con!!

episode of.title: Old Man and Bitter Girl (TV Series 2012â€“ )

-1.plot: OMBG talks with Brimstone at the Victoria Comic Con in Victoria, Texas. Find out what makes him tick and why he's one hell of a nice guy.

imdb.plot outline: Broadcasting out of South Texas' healthy underground, Timothy and Brea Danger share a weekly series that deals with humorous observations, bitter relationship advice, pop culture commentary, interviews and of course - lots of underground music as ear candy for music lovers. Sharing information and stories of their travels, band mishaps, and additional commentary from drop in guests, The Old Man and Bitter Girl podcast is celebrating Radio Free Texas the only way they know how - Big.
imdb.title: Old Man and Bitter Girl
